name: Checks general condition as approaches unit
Looks for leakage of fuel, oil, and coolants
Checks fluids, steering, all under hood conditions
Checks horn, windshield wipers, lights, body, doors,brake & electrical lines, flashers, trailer connections
Tests all brakes, tractor protection valve
Checks for jacks, tools, chains, spare fuses,warning triangles, fire extinguisher, first aid kit
